passage_text: Find your nearest PayPoint outlet. If you need to check if there is disabled access at a PayPoint outlet just call 0300 790 6165. PayPoint is not available in the Channel Islands or on the Isle of Man. If you live in the Channel Islands or on the Isle of Man, you can pay at any Post Office branch instead.

About PayPoint. Established in 1996, PayPoint is a leading specialist payments company, processing consumer payments across a wide variety of markets through its retail networks, internet and mobile phone channels. PayPoint has been a constituent of the FTSE4Good Index since 2008.
It's amazing what you can pick up at your local PayPoint store... PayPoint is the convenient and easy way to pay your household bills, top up your mobile phone, make other cash payments, load up y...
Trust PayPoint, Inc. to provide the professional payroll services you need. Spend a few minutes each pay period to send us your payroll information. We'll take care of the rest!

Available in over 5,700 convenience stores, garages, newsagents, supermarkets and shopping centres across the UK, open early ‘til late 7 days a week. Drop off or pick up your parcels at a time and a place that suits you.
